m_szDocTitle: Route Monkey’s ‘world leading’ electric car app wins £285k of funding - The Scotsman
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Route Monkey’s ‘world leading’ electric car app wins £285k of funding Route Monkey wins funding for electric car app. Picture: Contributed/Route Monkey 13:27 Thursday 09 June 2016 Have your say THE cash boost will help algorithm specialist Route Monkey accelerate development of game-changing solution for electric vehicle users Scottish Enterprise is supporting the research and development of a ground-breaking app that aims to improve life for the fast-growing number of electric vehicle (EV) users.
